title: Wandered Away
lyrics:
I wandered away, I wandered away in the morning
I wandered away, I wandered away [?]
You held me but you couldn't understand me
You held me and it eased your mind
It took a long time, it took a long time for me to breathe

I stood at your door and you found me when you left

You held me but you couldn't seem to change me

You held me and it eased your mind



Still I feel lost, I feel lost

I feel lost, I feel lost

I made you wait and I longed for the night

Still I feel lost when I close my eyes



I'll never forget how I never went down to the river

And I'll never forget I couldn't take care of myself

You held me but you couldn't understand me

You held me and it eased your mind



Still I feel lost, I feel lost

I feel lost, I feel lost

I made you wait and I longed for the night

Still I feel lost when I close my eyes

And I close my eyes

And I close my eyes
